summary: DOD plans to spend over $270 billion to buy more than 2,000 F-35 aircraft over the next 26 years. In this year's review, among other things, we found the F-35 program: Made slow, consistent progress on reliability and maintainability. But, it has not met 4 of 8 targets, which suggests the aircraft will be less reliable and more costly to maintain. Will start a modernization...
title: F-35 Joint Strike Fighter: Action Needed to Improve Reliability and Prepare for Modernization Efforts
